video_prompt: Subtle sway of tree leaves and rustle of the bushes. Slight glint on the scooter's metallic parts as if reacting to light. Gentle shift in the man's posture, almost imperceptible.
image_prompt:
A vibrant anime-style illustration of a young man, appearing to be in his late teens or early twenties, standing beside a modern light gray scooter on a city street. The man has short, dark hair and is wearing a simple blue t-shirt, dark gray pants, and white sneakers with black laces. He is holding the scooter's handlebars and has a calm, slightly thoughtful expression, looking towards the right side of the frame.

The scooter is sleek and contemporary with a prominent, rectangular headlight featuring an 'C' shaped light outline. The composition is a full-body shot of the man and scooter, captured from a slightly low angle, emphasizing the street level.

The background features soft, blurred depictions of urban architecture, including multi-story buildings with various shades of brown, beige, and light blue, and visible window details. Lush green trees and foliage are seen behind the buildings and in the upper right, with a street lamp subtly visible. The ground is a light gray asphalt road, with faint white street markings visible on the right. The overall lighting is bright and even, suggesting daytime. The atmosphere is casual and everyday, with a clean and clear aesthetic. The image includes a "c29" watermark in the bottom right corner.
refined_video_prompt: Subtle sway of tree leaves and rustle of bushes. Slight glint on the scooter's metallic parts. Gentle shift in the man's posture.
creative_video_prompt_1: Trees thrash violently, roots tearing up the ground. The scooter's metallic parts glow with volatile energy, sparking and reconfiguring. The man's body contorts with supernatural speed, limbs elongating and his expression twisting into a menacing grimace as he grips the handlebars, ready to launch a devastating attack. Buildings heave and crack, threatening to collapse under the intense pressure of the transforming scene.
creative_video_prompt_2: The man's shadow detaches, becoming a swirling vortex that pulls the scooter into its depths. Leaves on the trees shimmer, then invert, roots unfurling into the sky. The sidewalk buckles into an ethereal ripple, mirroring the man's impossible, backward-flowing steps as his shirt changes colors with each stride, ultimately dissolving into pure light.
creative_video_prompt_3: A sweeping crane shot descends from overhead, revealing the man and his scooter. A dramatic tracking shot follows him as he pushes the scooter forward, the tree leaves above him rustling intensely. As he pauses, a sharp glint catches on the scooter's chrome, accompanied by a rapid, confrontational zoom on his determined face, as if challenging unseen forces.
